titleInfo.title: 'File 32/27 National Income and Local Resources in Bahrain'

physicalDescription.extent: The papers are arranged in approximate chronological order from the front to the rear of the file.

Foliation: the main foliation sequence commences at the front cover with 1 and terminates at the last folio with 12; these numbers are written in pencil, are circled, and are located in the top right corner of the recto side of each folio.

mods.abstract: This file contains a letter (ff 2-4) sent from Charles Belgrave, Adviser to the Government of Bahrain, to several foreign companies active in Bahrain. The letter informed the companies that the Government of Bahrain wanted to obtain information relating to the country's national income and local resources and requested the following information concerning their operations in Bahrain:total value of labour;totalvalue of locally produced materials;total value of local services.The file contains responses (with the desired information enclosed) from the Bahrain Petroleum Company Limited (ff 5-8) and Petroleum Concessions Limited (ff 9-11).
